page.title: 10SKATING POND
page.content: The skating pond is a part of the problems associated with the golf course. It is to be reinstated with a sluice to enable control of the water level of the pond. The pond has been out of use for some considerable timeand thus the habitat has become overgrown and unmanageable. For the water to freeze in winterit must be lees than 30cm deepercause hard frosts rarely lower the temperature below _10 degrees celsius, and rarely last for more than a week at a time. The proposals are to leave an irregular edge and preserve the remaining aquatic vegetation, the wet ground to the south of the pond is to be planted with Salix.
